inclusion.criterion: Adult SCD patients with genotypes SS, SC, SB+, or SB-
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Allergic to both morphine sulfate and hydromorphone
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell disease, severe pain in lower back, and positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood. He is afebrile within normal blood pressure.
